src:
馬國用戶測試華為新手機 谷歌套件不能用

01 Nov 2019, 06:50

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月01日訊】中國華為公司本月在馬來西亞推出Mate 30系列手機，但馬國一名男子對新購的Mate 30 Pro進行測試，結果發現谷歌套件一個都不能用。對此，網民紛紛加以調侃，有人說這種手機就相當於模型玩具。
華為於10月在馬來西亞推出了Mate 30和Mate 30 Pro這兩款旗艦手機，其售價分別為2,799令吉（約4,726人民幣）和3,899令吉（約6,584人民幣）。
網上視頻顯示，該國一名男子對其新購的Mate 30 Pro進行測試。當他點擊YouTube、Google Map、Gmail、Play store等谷歌套件時，沒有一個可以正常執行。



幾個月前，由於美國政府禁止華為向美國企業採購零組件和技術，谷歌便停止與華為的合作業務，因此華為新推出智能手機無法使用上述那些應用程式。
基本上，海外所有安卓手機都採用谷歌提供的這套應用服務，任何一款安卓手機如果無法使用這些服務，其銷售會大受影響。
針對上述馬國男子的Mate 30 Pro無法使用谷歌套件，不少推特用戶留言吐槽。
「@mila5188」說：「華為手機=逗你玩模型玩具。」
「@qang91059927」說：「這個花瓶這麼的貴，不如買個蘋果（iPhone）8。」
「@Jeff71163440」說：「終於和牆內Android手機同步了，可喜可賀！」
「@alaska_bear」說：「這是買了個監控自己的電子磚頭！」
「@susanzh77455188」說：「在海外還買華為手機，還不便宜，不是腦殘嗎？」
「@busschool3」說：「這智商嚴重欠費，任正非和孟晚舟都用蘋果。得趕緊退貨買點兒腦殘片補補。」
「@costabrava2016」說：「這人不看新聞的。」
「@kllialan」說：「這位小哥是昏迷了多久？」
「@time20170927」說：「花偽（華為）現在到處行銷，用欺騙的手法，用假紅包騙人傳播推廣。非常流氓。」
「@Slong0427C」說：「接軌韭菜國的，能用才怪。問題是為什麼買？」
──轉自《大紀元》
（責任編輯：葉萍）
本文網址: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/10/31/a102697425.html
text:
Malaysian users test Huawei's new mobile phone Google Suite can not be used

01 Nov 2019, 06:50

[New Tang Dynasty Beijing time, November 01, 2019] China Huawei launched the Mate 30 series mobile phone in Malaysia this month, but a man from Malaysia tested the newly purchased Mate 30 Pro and found that one of the Google suites could not be used. In this regard, netizens have ridiculed, some people say that this mobile phone is equivalent to model toys.
Huawei launched the Mate 30 and Mate 30 Pro flagship phones in Malaysia in October at a price of RM2,799 (approximately RMB 4,726) and RM3,899 (approximately RMB 6,584).
An online video shows a man in the country testing his newly purchased Mate 30 Pro. When he clicks on Google Suite such as YouTube, Google Map, Gmail, Play Store, etc., none of them can be executed normally.



A few months ago, because the US government banned Huawei from purchasing components and technology from US companies, Google stopped its cooperation with Huawei. Therefore, Huawei's new smartphones cannot use these applications.
Basically, all Android phones overseas use the application service provided by Google. If any Android phone cannot use these services, its sales will be greatly affected.
Mate 30 Pro for the above-mentioned Malaysian men can't use Google Suite, and many Twitter users have a message.
"@mila5188" said: "Huawei mobile phone = tease you to play model toys."
"@qang91059927" said: "This vase is so expensive, it is better to buy an apple (iPhone) 8."
"@Jeff71163440" said: "I have finally synced with the Android phone in the wall. I am very happy!"
"@alaska_bear" said: "This is to buy an electronic brick to monitor yourself!"
"@susanzh77455188" said: "I still buy Huawei mobile phones overseas, is it not cheap, is it not brain damage?"
"@busschool3" said: "This IQ is a serious arrears. Ren Zhengfei and Meng Xiazhou both use apples. You have to rush to buy some brain fragments."
"@costabrava2016" said: "This person does not read the news."
"@kllialan" said: "How long is this little brother coma?"
"@time20170927" said: "Huawei (Huawei) is now marketing everywhere, using deceptive methods, using fake red packets to deceive people to spread and promote. Very rogue."
"@Slong0427C" said: "If you are connected to the country, you can use it. The question is why buy it?"
─Transfer from the Epoch Times
(Editor: Ye Ping)
This article URL: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/10/31/a102697425.html
